page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: One kind of work done in Law is Window Making. The name of the company is Carluke Windows.There are five workers employed,one of them being a female. They make double glazing,aluminium and wooden framed windows.They start at 8.30a.m.and finish at 5p.m.or later. They transport their materials by van which they themselves own. Another kind of work done in Law is sub-contract engineering.They have 8 full time male workers and 1 part time female.Their workers come from local areas.Their working hours are 8a.m.to 4.30p.m.One of their customers is British Steel. Alex.Duncan owns a company called Duracon Ltd.They supply carbon slabs, edging for gardens,window sills and steps.4 people are employed from local areas.They also supply sand and gravel to various different places.
